attributes.action: make it legal rear polar bears in UK farms to for their meat and fur to help conserve this endangered species
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Polar bears are currently under threat from changes in their arctic habitat due to global warming. We believe it would help to conserve these creatures by raising them on polar bear farms in the UK. Costs could be profitably met by selling farmed polar bear meat and fur in UK supermarkets. The government should make changes in the law to allow this to take place.

rejection.details: We are not aware that this is specifically illegal. Can you substantiate your premise that it is?
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
